This platform fosters collaboration, highlights emerging trends, and encourages knowledge exchange.

siteb.faq.hero.title: Frequently Asked Questions
siteb.faq.hero.subtitle: Find quick answers that help you plan your experience at TurkmenTravel Expo & Forum.
siteb.faq.entries.1.question: Where will the TurkmenTravel Expo & Forum take place?
siteb.faq.entries.1.answer: The 2026 edition is hosted at the Ashgabat Exhibition Centre, featuring plenary halls, breakout rooms, and a dedicated expo pavilion connected to the main campus.
siteb.faq.entries.2.question: Which dates should I reserve?
siteb.faq.entries.2.answer: The forum opens on 22 May 2026 with registration and a welcome reception. Conference sessions and the expo floor run from 23–25 May, followed by optional site visits on 26 May.
siteb.faq.entries.3.question: How can I request B2B meetings during the event?
siteb.faq.entries.3.answer: Once your registration is confirmed, you will receive credentials for the matchmaking platform. Use it to select preferred partners, propose time slots, and confirm meetings before arriving in Ashgabat.
siteb.faq.entries.4.question: Are translation and interpretation services available?
siteb.faq.entries.4.answer: Simultaneous interpretation is provided in English, Russian, Turkmen, and Mandarin for plenary sessions. Additional languages may be arranged for private meetings with advance notice.
siteb.faq.entries.5.question: Can I update my registration details later?
siteb.faq.entries.5.answer: Yes. Sign in with the email address used during registration to update your profile, upload presentation materials, or change delegation members up to 7 days before the event.
siteb.faq.entries.6.question: Who can assist with visa or travel documentation?
siteb.faq.entries.6.answer: Our travel desk liaises with the relevant authorities to issue official invitation letters. Contact traveldesk@turkmentravelexpo.com with your passport scan and planned travel dates.
siteb.official.hero.title: Official Support
siteb.official.hero.subtitle: National institutions partnering to deliver Turkmenistan's signature travel and hospitality event.
siteb.official.intro.title: Our Institutional Partners
siteb.official.intro.body: TurkmenTravel Expo & Forum is organised in close coordination with government ministries, industry regulators, and strategic enterprises that champion the country's tourism agenda.
siteb.official.cards.1.title: Government Partnership
siteb.official.cards.1.body: The State Committee for Tourism of Turkmenistan provides strategic oversight, policy alignment, and executive sponsorship for the forum's programme.
siteb.official.cards.2.title: Travel & Expo Infrastructure
siteb.official.cards.2.body: National carriers, transport authorities, and venue operators ensure seamless arrivals, onsite logistics, and secure exhibition facilities for delegates.
siteb.official.cards.3.title: International Promotion
siteb.official.cards.3.body: Our diplomatic missions and investment agencies promote the forum abroad, attracting global partners and media attention.
siteb.official.commitments.title: What Official Support Means
siteb.official.commitments.items.1: Priority access to Ashgabat's premier venues and hospitality services.
siteb.official.commitments.items.2: Coordinated media coverage across national broadcasters and digital channels.
siteb.official.commitments.items.3: Delegation support for inbound investors, tour operators, and airline partners.
siteb.official.commitments.items.4: High-level protocol assistance for ministerial and international guests.
siteb.official.contact.title: Contact the Secretariat
siteb.official.contact.body: For official letters, protocol arrangements, or partnership enquiries, reach out to the organising committee.

siteb.about_expo.hero.title: TurkmenTravel Expo & Forum 2026
siteb.about_expo.hero.subtitle: Your guide to the international turkmentravel 2026 exhibition:goals format opportunities for participants
siteb.about_expo.intro.title: TurkmenTravel Expo Vision and Goals
siteb.about_expo.intro.lead: The exhibition aims to become a key platform for promoting Turkmenistan’s tourism potential, presenting innovative travel products and services, and creating new opportunities for cooperation with international partners. It highlights achievements in hospitality, transport, logistics, digital tourism services, cultural tourism, and sustainable development.
siteb.about_expo.intro.bullets.0: Strengthen business relations and stimulate new cooperation projects.
siteb.about_expo.intro.bullets.1: Demonstrate export opportunities and investment potential.
siteb.about_expo.intro.bullets.2: Promote integration in logistics, science, education, and culture.
siteb.about_expo.intro.bullets.3: Support digital transformation and the adoption of advanced technologies.
siteb.about_expo.why.title: Why to participate?
siteb.about_expo.numbers.title: By the Numbers
siteb.about_expo.map.title: Flexible options for every concept and occasion
siteb.about_expo.cta.exhibitor_text1: Secure your strategic position at the TurkmenTravel Expo and Forum to gain direct visibility among key government officials, international investors, and influential buyers. This is a distinguished opportunity to effectively showcase your services and expand your market reach.
siteb.about_expo.cta.exhibitor_text2: The Expo serves as the ideal platform to establish valuable partnerships within the rapidly developing Central Asian tourism sector and position your brand at the forefront of industry transformation.
siteb.advantages.header: Participating in the International Tourism Exhibition and Forum TurkmenTravel-2026 offers focused strategic advantages:
siteb.advantages.items.1.title: Strategic Market Access:
siteb.advantages.items.1.desc: Gain direct entry to the rapidly growing Turkmen and Central Asian tourism markets.
siteb.advantages.items.2.title: High-Level Networking:
siteb.advantages.items.2.desc: Connect with key decision-makers, government officials, and leading international investors.
siteb.advantages.items.3.title: Innovation & Digitalization Focus:
siteb.advantages.items.3.desc: Engage in critical discussions on technological advancements and the future of smart tourist services.
siteb.advantages.items.4.title: Expert Knowledge Exchange:
siteb.advantages.items.4.desc: Acquire valuable international best practices in hospitality, sustainable tourism, and cultural development.
siteb.advantages.items.5.title: Maximum Brand Visibility:
siteb.advantages.items.5.desc: Effectively showcase your products and services to a targeted professional audience of buyers and media.
siteb.about_forum.hero.title: TurkmenTravel Forum 2026
siteb.about_forum.hero.subtitle: An international platform showcasing Turkmenistan`s tourism potential, innovative travel solutions, and new opportunities for global cooperation.
siteb.about_forum.body.title: TurkmenTravel Forum 2026
siteb.about_forum.body.p1: The TurkmenTravel Forum 2026 brings together leading experts, government representatives, tourism organizations, investors, and innovators to discuss key trends shaping the global travel industry.
siteb.about_forum.body.p2: The forum serves as a strategic platform for dialogue, knowledge exchange, and building long-term international partnerships.
siteb.about_forum.body.list_1: Global Positioning of Turkmenistan: Strategies for strengthening Turkmenistan`s presence on the international tourism map.
siteb.about_forum.body.list_2: Sustainable Tourism Development: Environmental protection, preservation of cultural heritage, and responsible management of tourist destinations.
siteb.about_forum.body.list_3: Digital Transformation in Tourism: Innovative IT solutions, online booking services, virtual tours, smart travel tools, and analytics.
siteb.about_forum.body.list_4: Tourism Infrastructure & Investment: Public-private partnerships, attracting foreign investment, and modernizing hospitality facilities.
siteb.about_forum.body.list_5: International Cooperation: Collaboration with global tourism organizations, including UNWTO, UNESCO, and industry associations.
siteb.about_forum.body.list_6: Education & Human Capital: Academic mobility, professional training, and capacity-building programs in hospitality and tourism.
siteb.about_forum.body.p4: Participation offers industry professionals a unique opportunity for high-level dialogue, establishing valuable new business contacts, securing investments, and defining the strategic outlook for sustainable tourism development in the region.
